description:
Cross-platform fitting tool for EVE Online

Pyfa, short for python fitting assistant, allows you to create, experiment with, and save ship fittings without being in game. Open source and written in Python, it is available on any platform where Python 3 and wxWidgets are available, including Windows, macOS, and Linux.
Fixes:
- Fixed time graphs not showing dynamic changes of damage values for some cases since v2.61.0 (disintegrators)
- Fixed crashes related to GDI leaks in ship browser on windows (#2629, thx @cryonox!)
- Fixed several crashes and more minor bugs caused by upgrade of wxpython to 4.2.2 (#2646, #2647, #2648, #2651)
